info.title: Onetime Secret API [2025-01-24]
info.description: The Onetime Secret API allows you to securely share secrets. This API provides endpoints to create, retrieve, and manage secrets. You can use this API to generate a secret URL that can be shared with others, ensuring that the secret is only accessible once. The API supports various operations such as creating a new secret, retrieving a secret, and deleting a secret. It is designed to be simple and secure, making it easy to integrate into your applications.

secret.description: The secret value to be stored

skill.description: Hidden field for bot detection (should be empty)

post.description: Generates a password and returns a link that can be viewed only once. This is the v2 API version od the /v1/share endpoint. TTL is limited to 7 days (anonymous), 14 days (basic free plan), and 30 days (premium plan).

Creates an encrypted secret and returns a link that can be viewed only once. This is the v2 API version od the /v1/share endpoint. TTL is limited to 7 days (anonymous), 14 days (basic free plan), and 30 days (premium plan).
Creates an encrypted secret and returns a link that can be viewed only once. TTL is limited to 7 days (anonymous), 14 days (basic free plan), and 30 days (premium plan).

secret.description: The secret content to be encrypted and shared

post.description: Generates a random password and returns a link that can be viewed only once. TTL is limited to 7 days (anonymous), 14 days (basic free plan), and 30 days (identity plan).

ttl.description:
Time-to-live in seconds. Maximum varies by authentication:
* Anonymous: 604800 (7 days)
* Basic free plan: 1209600 (14 days)
* Premium plan: 2592000 (30 days)

passphrase.description: Optional password protection. Must be 8-64 characters

recipient.description: Email address of intended recipient. Triggers notification when specified

CookieAuth.name: sess
CookieAuth.description: Session cookie for authenticated web access
